API_REDIS_URL.description: URL for connecting to API's worker Redis instance

LOG_SHAREDB.description: Whether to log all ShareDB activity

PORT.description: Port on which to run the app

SENTRY_DSN.description: A key for sending events to Sentry

SIGNING_SALT.description: Salt shared with API for generating keys

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: Key shared with API to verify connection cookies

TZ.description: Time zone for this app to run in

WEB_URL.description: URL on which the web app runs
